sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #searchSchlCode#

SELECT idx AS seqNo , CONCAT(stnd_yr, '년도 ', stnd_mn, '월 ', stnd_wk, '주차 월간보육 계획안') AS title , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(main_exp, 1, 10), '...') AS contents , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS regDt , reg_id AS regId , DATE_FORMAT(mod_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS modDt , mod_id AS modId FROM tb_cplan_mn WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #searchSchlCode# ORDER BY stnd_yr, stnd_mn, stnd_wk DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT A.class_cd AS cl_cd , B.sub_nm AS cl_nm FROM tb_teacher A JOIN tb_school B ON A.school_cd = B.cd AND A.class_cd = B.sub_cd WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.id = #SESSION_LOGIN_ID# AND A.school_cd = #SESSION_LOGIN_SCHOOL_CD# AND A.us_yn = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cplan_mn WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #schoolCode# AND class_cd = #classCode# AND stnd_yr = #stndYear# AND stnd_mn = #stndMonth# AND stnd_wk = #stndWeek# AND us_yn = 'Y'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM tb_cplan_mn WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #schoolCode# AND class_cd = #classCode# AND stnd_yr = #stndYear# AND stnd_mn = #stndMonth# AND stnd_wk = #stndWeek# AND us_yn = 'N'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cplan_mn ( idx , school_cd , class_cd , stnd_yr , stnd_mn , stnd_wk , title , main_exp , outdr_act , main_act , play_mtl , evnt_plan , app_stat , us_yn , reg_dt , reg_id , mod_dt , mod_id) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(idx) + 1, 1) FROM tb_cplan_mn a WHERE a.school_cd = #schoolCode# ) , #schoolCode# , #classCode# , #stndYear# , #stndMonth# , #stndWeek# , #title# , #mainExp# , #outdoorAct# , #mainAct# , #playMtl# , #eventPlan# , '' , 'Y' , NOW() , #id# , NOW() , #id#)
